channel.title: PowerSkills by Starblaster100
channel.description:
It has come to my attention that I haven't created any scripts in a [b]very[/b] long time, and that people are still using my old scripts to Auto.
I thought: [i]"Why not update all my Free Scripts and post them to the community?"[/i]
Then I thought: [i]"Why not Update them all, post them to the community and post them all as one script?"[/i] ;)
So Here it is. [u]Introducing ...[/u]
[center][size=20pt]PowerSkills By Starblaster100[/size]
[img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/3590/powerskillsxs7.jpg[/img]
[code] { ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ] [ .________ _______.__ .__.__ .__ ] [ \_____ \______ _ __ ___________/ ____/ | _|__| | | | ______ ] [ | ___/ _ \ \/ \/ // __ \_ __ \____ \| |/ / | | | | / ___/ ] [ | | ( <_> ) /\ ___/| | \/ \ <| | |_| |__\___ \ ] [ |___| \____/ \/\_/ \___ \|__| /______ /__|_ \__|____/____/____ / ] [ \/ \/ \/ \/ ] [ By Starblaster100 ] [ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ] [ >> DESCRIPTION << ] [ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ] [ This is a Script Designed to Power Auto a Specific Skill on a Specific ] [ Character until a Certain Number of Loads have been Power Autoed. This ] [ will then Switch Character and Power Auto the next Players Specific Skill. ] [ This will Keep Repeating until all Players are Inactive, or the script is ] [ Terminated ] [ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ] [ >> SUPPORTED SKILLS << ] [ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ] [ o Mining - Must have a Pick and be near Minable Rocks ] [ o Woodcutting - Must have an Axe and be near Cuttable Trees ] [ o Fishing - Must have Fishing Equipment and be near a Fish Spot ] [ o Bone Burying - Must be near Bones, or a Bank if Withdrawing from Bank ] [ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ] [ >> SETUP INSTRUCTIONS << ] [ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ] [ o For each Individual Player, Equip the *Specific Equipment* needed to ] [ Power the Specific Skill Selected ] [ o *Place* Each Individual Player in the *Specific Spots* where they are ] [ going to work ] [ o Run the Script and Fill in the Setup ] [ o Do not Change Anything in the Script Itself. Hit the Run Button Now! ] [ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ] [ Script by Starblaster100 ] [ Please Post Progress Reports, Bugs and Suggestions in my Thread! ] [ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- } [/code] [br]
[size=20pt]Download the Script:[/size]
[ul][*][size=14pt][URL=http://rapidshare.com/files/14478545/PowerSkills_and_SRL.rar]Version 1.0[/URL][/size] [*][size=14pt][URL=http://rapidshare.com/files/14557179/PowerSkills_Ver_1.1_including_SRL.rar]Version 1.1[/URL][/size] [*][size=14pt][URL=http://rapidshare.com/files/15828454/PowerSkills_Ver_1.3_including_SRL.rar]Version 1.3[/URL][/size] [*][size=14pt][URL=http://rapidshare.com/files/15921294/PowerSkills_Ver_1.4_including_SRL.rar]Version 1.4[/URL][/size] [*][size=14pt][URL=http://rapidshare.com/files/17923043/PowerSkills_Ver_2.0_including_SRL.rar]Version 2.0[/URL][/size] [*][size=14pt][URL=http://rapidshare.com/files/22292405/PowerSkills_Ver_2.1_including_SRL.rar]Version 2.1[/URL][/size] [*][size=14pt][URL=http://rapidshare.com/files/24044478/PowerSkills_Ver_2.2_including_SRL.rar]Version 2.2[/URL][/size] [*][size=14pt][URL=http://rapidshare.com/files/29489359/PowerSkills_Ver_3.0_including_SRL_Ver_3.7_for_Divi.rar]Version 3.0[/URL][/size][/ul]
[/center]
[br]
Please Note: This Script was Scripted [u]without Logging onto RS once![/u] That means it probably has a few bugs in it which i need to iron out. [i]It hasn't been tested at all![/i]
[br]
All I ask of you is you [i][b]Post Bugs, Progress Reports and Thank yous[/b][/i], just so i know how my Script is Doing.
Thanks a lot, and Enjoy the Script,
Starblaster100

item.title: PowerSkills by Starblaster100
item.dc:creator: @Amgdust Amgdust
item.description:
@Amgdust wrote:

Hmm, mabye someone could solve this for me?

Lets see… I am using version 3.0 and when I run the script, I dont get an error within the script itself, but with a SRL file.

Line 140: [Error] (16172:15): Unknown identifier 'x' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.13\includes\SRL/SRL/Extended/xMapWalk.scar

THEN…

Line 25: [Error] (25:28): Unknown identifier 'MMX1' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.13\includes\SRL\SRL\Extended\xMapWalk.scar

Strange huh?
I’ve triped 3 diffrent versions of scar and 4 versions of SRL. Including the latest, version 4 which I also had no luck with this. If anyone could shed some light on the situation, I’d be grateful.

Read full topic
